subject: Basketball (College)
organizations: Boys and Girls High School (Brooklyn, NY)
lead_paragraph: Three basketball players at Jones County Junior College in Ellisville, Miss., have a few things in common: hoop dreams, academic realities and an upbringing in Brooklyn.
snippet: Three basketball players at Jones County Junior College in Ellisville, Miss., have a few things in common: hoop dreams, academic realities and an upbringing in Brooklyn.
